definition: to go to the bottom of things (idiom)
pinyin: da3 po4 sha1 guo1 wen4 dao4 di3

sentences.english: NO23, I'm making casserole for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我在煮晚餐要喫的砂鍋。

sentences.english: Heat up oil in clay pot. Stir-fry ginger slices till fragrant. Add chicken pieces and cook for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 砂鍋下油燒熱，放入薑片爆香，加入雞件焗5分鐘。

sentences.english: I'm making casserole for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我在煮晚餐要喫的砂鍋。

sentences.english: Your persistence in questioning, by which you want to reach a full understanding of it, will lead to a splitting headache.
sentences.chinese: 爲了充分理解它而打破砂鍋問到底，會讓你頭痛欲裂。

sentences.english: Clay compression for a sea turtle casserole dish creates a solid base without air bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 粘土海龜砂鍋菜壓縮創建一個沒有氣泡的堅實基礎。

sentences.english: Decoct Chinese traditional medicine uses arenaceous boiler and need not what is the reason of iron bowl?
sentences.chinese: 煎中藥應用砂鍋而不用鐵鍋的原因是什麼？

sentences.english: Scoop everything into an earthen casserole. Cover with aluminum foil and steam over high heat for 1/2 hour.
sentences.chinese: 將所有材料放進砂鍋裏，用錫紙蓋好，猛火蒸半小時。

sentences.english: You can use leftover turkey in casseroles and sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用剩下的火雞肉做砂鍋菜和三明治。

sentences.english: Many people love chicken with vinger casserole.
Congee eis the way locals love to start their day, and one of the most popular vendors is Ru Xuan Sha Guo Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 當地人早上喜歡喝粥，最受歡迎的要數如軒砂鍋粥。

sentences.english: Consider soups and casseroles and how meat is a small portion of those types of meals.
sentences.chinese: 可以考慮湯和砂鍋，肉是這種食物中很小的一部分。

sentences.english: We serve some typical Cantonese food today, such as Roast Sucking Pig and seafood in casserole.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天有一些廣東特色菜，如烤乳豬和砂鍋海鮮。

sentences.english: Centering clay for your sea turtle casserole dish ensures a symmetrical piece.
sentences.chinese: 中心爲您的海龜砂鍋菜一塊粘土確保了對稱。

sentences.english: Many of your favorite dishes can be altered to slow cooking in a crock pot.
sentences.chinese: 很多你喜歡的菜都可以調整一下來用砂鍋烹飪。

sentences.english: Clay pot cooked yellow pea cake is yummy, tasty and refreshing, and many people like it.
sentences.chinese: 砂鍋豌豆黃味道甜美，清涼爽口，許多人都喜歡喫。

definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
